issue.title: [Go][Parquet] Plain boolean decoder is broken
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16563](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16563). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
When reading parquet files with `PLAIN` encoded boolean values, `bitOffset` in the boolean decoder is not properly managed which results in garbled values being returned.
